name: dotCover.xunit.task
tagline: dotCover analysis using xunit.console.runner task for VSTS
body:
### dotCover.xunit.task
This task executes the dotCover analysis during the build process of VSTS.

### Installation
This task can be installed by using [tfx-cli](https://github.com/Microsoft/tfs-cli)

### Disclaimer
This task is provided as-is, without warranty of any kind, express or implied and requires a valid dotCover 9.2+ license.
dotCover is a registered trademark of JetBrains and the task is developed independently of JetBrains.

### Contact
Having trouble with the task? Open an issue or contact @rodrigoff
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
